ActionResult.FlavorText: I adjust my heading towards Deepmine.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: It's infernal surface, the smoky peaks and fiery chasms welcome you with indifference.
ActionResult.Title: Travel to Deepmine

ActionResult.FlavorText: I delve through crag and fire.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: Inside the volcanic mountain, you find a heart of living flame.
ActionResult.Title: Explore Deepmine

FlavorText: With it's surface engulfed in flame and smoke, the only rule below is: don't ask what the creature beside you did to retreat here.
Name: Deepmine

ActionResult.FlavorText: There is little else to do but bend my back and put the flame to the tunnel.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: In the stretch of tunnel you've been assigned, you see a glint... a shimmer... what could it be?
ActionResult.Title: Toil in the Deepmines

ActionResult.FlavorText: There is little else to do but bend my back and put the flame to the tunnel.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: You do the day's work, your hands and back sore. One can only endure so much...
ActionResult.Title: Toil in the Deepmines

FlavorText: As the contract binds, there is little else to do but bend my back and put the flame to the tunnel.
Name: Toil the Deep

FlavorText: Harken to that melodious sound of the clink of coin.
Name: Gold

ActionResult.FlavorText: Fate must be smiling at me.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: Entombed in stone you find the skeleton of a small craft, by the laws of salvage it's yours to dream with.
ActionResult.Title: Excavating the Find

FlavorText: A shimmering glint embedded in the grasp of stone... This is going to take some work.
Name: Glint in the Wall

ActionResult.FlavorText: When did I stop dreaming? Was it when I entered this Hell? Was it before?
ActionResult.OutcomeText: With your surface time before bed, you gaze into space. Bringing the broken ship back to life and getting out of these mines is all that matters to you now.
ActionResult.Title: Dreaming of Freedom

ActionResult.FlavorText: I put my nose to the grinding bench, and install some of the parts.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: She's half done, you're almost there.
ActionResult.Title: Welding her Together

FlavorText: The remnants of someone else's dream, perhaps you can make it your own.
Name: Shattered Shuttle

FlavorText: The flaming heart of a fiery mountain, it's vibrant heat is intoxicating, and must be contained to be handled.
Name: Flaming Essence

ActionResult.FlavorText: I approach the shift supervisor to see to speak of Freedom.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: She suggests that you save to take a trip to Wreckage Bay. They might have what you need.
ActionResult.Title: To Speak of Freedom

ActionResult.FlavorText: I approach supervisor Uma, but I've already asked her about my dream.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: She greets you like she would any of the other scabs, but she does inquire as to whether or not you've moved up in the world.
ActionResult.Title: Talking to Uma

FlavorText: Shift Supervisor Uma, is as experienced a helldiver as they come. In the Deepmines, she's the person all the scabs look up to.
Name: Helldiver Uma

ActionResult.FlavorText: Greyhound can take me where I want to go.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: Passage requires payment.
ActionResult.Title: On Greyhound's Fare

ActionResult.FlavorText: I ask Greyhound about Wreckage bay.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: He's willing to take you, holding out a hand for payment before he'll grant passage.
ActionResult.Title: On Greyhound's Fare

ActionResult.FlavorText: I drop a coin into his hand.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: He gestures for you to follow. It doesn't take long.
ActionResult.Title: Paying For Passage

FlavorText: He can take you where you want to go, for a price, of course.
Name: Greyhound

ActionResult.FlavorText: The sheer amount of salvage strewn about space here inspires awe.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: You enter the salvage station.
ActionResult.Title: Travel to Wreckage Bay

ActionResult.FlavorText: I sift through miles of half salvaged ships.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: You find one wreck as of yet untouched, it has something in it's cargo bay.
ActionResult.Title: Explore Wreckage Bay

FlavorText: The Buccaneer's bonyard, a veritable asteroid belt except without any asteroids, there's just a whole lot of stolen ships and ship parts floating around.
Name: Wreckage Bay

ActionResult.FlavorText: I've have enough, time to continue my journey.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: He unceremoniously dumps a pile of components both mundane and magical on the table in front of you.
ActionResult.Title: Buying Ship Parts

ActionResult.FlavorText: I inquire about ship parts, he gives a sickeningly wet and not quite toothy grin.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: Delighted that you're in search of scraps. He informs you that if you have the gold, he's got the parts. If not, you can work... like a dog to save for what you need.
ActionResult.Title: On Table Scraps

FlavorText: A ghoulish servant of greater sires, he takes delight in reminding those who darken his door that they are in search of... scraps.
Name: Dogboy

ActionResult.FlavorText: The plasma cutter arcs as you search for whatever might be of value.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: It's not much better then the toil of Deepmine, at least it isn't so damn hot.
ActionResult.Title: Slicing Salvage

FlavorText: Compensation can be had, for those willing to scour the ships of the dead.
Name: Salvage Scrap

ActionResult.FlavorText: Seeking to understand the manipulation of reality's component parts.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: This evokes the memory of our ancient ancestors, banging rocks together to produce flame, thankfully we have manuals.
ActionResult.Title: Praying over Magic Wires

ActionResult.FlavorText: Seeking to understand the manipulation of reality's component parts.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: This feeling evokes the memory of our ancient ancestors, banging rocks together to produce flame, thankfully we have manuals.
ActionResult.Title: Praying over Magic Wires

FlavorText: These look like a jumble of wires and witchy arcanery.
Name: Components

ActionResult.FlavorText: I insert the mechanism into it's place and twist.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: Inside the Cryo Coffin, a man awakens.
ActionResult.Title: Inserting the Crypt Key

FlavorText: Vampiric Nobility make use of cryogenic freezing to both preserve themselves and to pass time without notice. This one is marked with the symbol of Clan Darkstar.
Name: Cryo Coffin

FlavorText: A retro-fitted meso-scaled energy supply, meant to power a demanding household appliance, will barely power a shuttle.
Name: Jolt Battery

ActionResult.FlavorText: I can barely believe it, I'm almost there.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: You acquire you first ship.
ActionResult.Title: Applying Finishing Touches

FlavorText: The Wings of Liberty are halfway finished.
Name: Half Built Shuttle

FlavorText: A basic shuttle capable of carrying one to two passengers on short flights through the emptyness between.
Name: Shuttle

FlavorText: It's arcane matrix was designed after King Arthur's own legendary scabbard, able to protect against even some of the most powerful magical skullduggery.
Name: Pendragon Veil

FlavorText: A powerful laser array developed by the best magi of The White Lodge, named after Lancelot's own sword.
Name: Rays of Arondite

FlavorText: The ultimate weapon given to Arthur by the Lady of the Lake, remembered as the hope of mankind. Excalibur.
Name: Excalibur

ActionResult.FlavorText: Flavor text...
ActionResult.OutcomeText: Outcome text...
ActionResult.Title: Explore the Dark Shroud

FlavorText: A dense interstellar cloud obscures this place, making it the place the ideal environment for Aristoratic Vampire Pirates.
Name: Nocturne

ActionResult.FlavorText: I cautiously explore the space between, where pirates stalk their prey unseen.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: You uncover a handful of notable locations.
ActionResult.Title: Explore the Shadowy Veil

FlavorText: The dark prince's abode, a palatial fortress carved from an isolated asteroid. Tread lightly, for here Antediluvian's dwell.
Name: Dracule

FlavorText: A Flotilla of Raiders calls this place their rally point. Vampiric Admirals wine and dine upon the unsuspecting.
Name: Crimsontide

FlavorText: A haven for the lucky, doom for the unlucky. Jack made sure to found this Oasis far away from the desert authority.
Name: One Eyed Jacks

FlavorText: An honorable den of thieves if ever there was one. More clink passes between hands here than most would realize.
Name: Smuggler's Nook

FlavorText: Ever mysterious, this shaded and illusive planet seems capable of secreting itself away from lawful enterprise.
Name: Rakshasa

FlavorText: Classified.
Name: Black Sun Campaign

FlavorText: The greatest spoils of all hunts for the Vampiric kind are gathered thither here, a sphere of red where sweet nectar overfloweth.
Name: The Feast

FlavorText: The dreaded piratess and captain of the Red Cutlass. Current Admiral Commanding of the Crimsontide.
Name: Admiral Sascha

FlavorText: Undisputed ruler of Nocturne, founder of The Black and Crimson Courts. Also a licensed clinical therapist.
Name: High Prince Vladimir

FlavorText: A bauble marked with the symbol of the dark star. Can grant access to a Cryo Coffin bearing the same symbol.
Name: Crypt Key

FlavorText: A Vampire Prince, who seems to be of good disposition and humor. Blonde of hair and fair of skin, he is eternally grateful to you for having freed him.
Name: Alucard

FlavorText: An eccentric private investigator with a penchant for cherry pie and a "damn fine" cup of coffee.
Name: P.I. Beaumont

FlavorText: A retired gentleman thief whose found his calling helping... well thieves. He makes an absolute fortune fencing contraband and stolen plunder.
Name: Jean

ActionResult.FlavorText: Somehow that cacophonous din they call music reaches me through the space between. Fracking fuel sniffers.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: You defeat the vermin.
ActionResult.Title: Battle the Pirate Cutter

FlavorText: Such ships are crewed by at most a handful of aspiring ghouls. They fill their purses along with their bellies.
Name: Pirate Cutter

FlavorText: Mark of the Crimson Fleet, can be exchanged for rewards at the proper authority.
Name: Crimson Mark

ActionResult.FlavorText: And I'm putting it back together again.
ActionResult.OutcomeText: Oh it's a Chaingun, that's just Christmas.
ActionResult.Title: Taking Weapon Apart

FlavorText: A battered weapons package.
Name: Junked Pattern A Arms Platform

FlavorText: Home of the dwarves, ale flows like rivers and slave chains bind the cosmos; here, wealth is forged in the furnaces of tyranny.
Name: Glint
